data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Buenos Aires, Argentina a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Buenos Aires, Argentina
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 11,346,006 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.

data.section_summary: On average, 21 babies will be born in the next hour to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
data.prayer: Lord, make yourself real to these new families.
Father, encourage the 1,528,320 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Buenos Aires. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Turk people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Turk people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Turk people is yours.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Buenos Aires, Argentina. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Buenos Aires.
Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Buenos Aires, Argentina.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight
